One company, Momz Love, supplied local authorities with bogus tenancy agreements and other documents suggesting they operated in the local area. The other company, Unique Homes Lettings (which was also connected to Momz Love), supported the applications by claiming to be the landlord at the respective premises.

And to top it all off, Unique Homes used stolen cards to make payments to local authorities for business rates "in error" and asking them to be refunded to a different bank account, securing at least Â£8,000.

The Official Receiver is currently the Liquidator of these companies, I would expect to see disqualifications for the directors of these companies but will the Official Receiver or any independent Insolvency Practitioner appointed be able to secure recovery of the fraudulently claimed funds.

#insolvency #businessrecovery #restructuring #turnaround #business #finance #debt #fraud #covidsupportfraud #accountant

La Socogeg si avvale di muratori e macchinari che hanno la capacitÃ  di adattarsi alle diverse esigenze architettoniche dei clienti. Colori naturali sintetici, cornicioni, zoccolature, applicazioni, archi, davanzali e decorazioni sono tutti elementi della facciata che vengono concordati con i clienti allo scopo di consegnare un lavoro che soddisfi appieno le loro esigenze, inoltre Ã¨ partner di fiducia di architetti e geometri in quanto Ã¨ in grado di garantire una perfetta e accurata realizzazione della facciata, pagamenti personalizzati con le migliori societÃ  di finanziamenti.

We are delighted to announce the recent success of Tumbuan & Partners (T&P) in representing PT Hutama Karya Infrastruktur (HKI) for the closing of the Conditional Shares Sale and Purchase Agreement (CSPA) with PT Hakaaston (HKA), for the acquisition of PT Bhirawa Steel.

Led by our Senior Partner, Jennifer B. Tumbuan (@jennifer_tumbuan), together with our Senior Associate lawyers Risman Yansen Mario (@rismanyansen) and Mada Herpadma Kusumasidarta (@madaherpadma). We advise on the entire aspects of the transaction, including the structuring of the transaction, negotiation, legal due diligence of PT Bhirawa Steel, and prepare the transaction documents comprised of (i) Term Sheets; and (ii) CSPA.

HKI and HKA are the subsidiaries of PT Hutama Karya (Persero) which is widely renowned as one of the leading state-owned infrastructure company in Indonesia.

This transaction is expected to improve the business performance of HKI, which fully support and signify the Trans Sumatera Toll Road's development that is considered to give significant advantage to PT Hutama Karya (Persero) as a part of its strategic plan. 

Congratulations for all the parties involved! We are proud to be part of yet another significant history in the development of infrastructure projects in Indonesia and we look forward to making greater contributions in the future.

#tumbuanpartners #lawfirm #indonesia #legal #law #lawyer #corporatelawyer #leadinglawyer #advocate #dealmaker #committedtoexcellence #workhard #worksmart #restructuring #acquisition #infrastructure #steel

âŒ Plastic water bottles are a huge burden  for the environment and are ultimately unsustainable.

Banyak yang berpikir kalau pertengkaran terjadi karena kedua belah pihak sudah tak saling menyayangi. 

Nah kalau konteksnya kakak-adik yang bertengkar? Benarkah begitu juga?

Tak bisa dipungkiri slide hal 3 banyak sekali diketemui, bahwa harta juga bisa menjadi penyebab kakak adik tidak akur. Misalnya terkait dengan pembagian saham perusahaan. 

Tak peduli seberapa dekat mereka waktu kecil dulu, hal ini bisa mengubah kedekatan menjadi permusuhan! Lalu, akan semakin memanas kondisinya bila sejak awal orang tua mungkin tidak membaginya secara adil.

Akan lebih susah memang untuk memperbaiki hubungan yang rusak di masa dewasa ketimbang masa kecil. Sebab, sudah ada campur tangan gengsi dan ego dalam hal ini.

Namun, bukan berarti saudara kandung yang bertengkar tak bisa berbaikan sama sekali. 
Selama masih ada kenangan dan rasa sayang, pasti ikatan dan hubungan akan membaik kembali.
Mari budayakan membaca dari slide pertama hingga akhir ya.

Is a rising mumber of hearings where HMRC are the petitioning creditor symptomatic of HMRC no longer taking their supportive approach to businesses struggling with tax debts or are these just instances where HMRC have no choice but to issue winding up petitions.

Personally I'm in two minds about HMRC's stance, tax debts have to be collected yes, but pushing businesses that may well be viable into insolvency may not be good PR, on the other hand if stronger enforcement prompts directors to take financial advice earlier than they would have otherwise done it could be seen as a positive as early proactive action increases the number of options available to a business to help restructure and potentially avoid closure.

Jain Irrigation Systems Limited (JISL) said on June 21 that its board has decided to merge its international irrigation business with Rivulis Pte Ltd., a part of Singapore's Temasek Group, to create a global irrigation and climate
major and considerably reduce the company's debt.

JISL will merge irrigation business worth â‚¹4200 crore with Rivulis of which Rs 2,700 crore will be used to repay it's all overseas debt and Rs 200 crore will come to the parent company, a PTI report stated.

The merged entity will "create a global Irrigation and Climate leader - being 2nd largest in the world with $750 million in revenues," according to a stock exchange announcement. While Temasek will hold 78 percent of the merged entity, Jain International Business will have 22 percent.

Cash proceeds will be utilised for reduction of consolidated debt of Jain Irrigation by 45 percent, which includes all the restructured overseas bonds to the tune of $225 million and complete debt of overseas operating companies comprising international irrigation business.

Source: MoneyControl
